content:
That's great to hear! I'm glad I could help you make a decision.

That's wonderful that your sister's son is interested in data science and programming too! Coursera is an excellent resource for him to continue learning and upskilling in those areas. With Coursera, he can explore various topics, deepen his knowledge, and even earn certificates to enhance his resume.

As a proud aunt/uncle, you can play a significant role in encouraging and supporting his interests. Recommending Coursera to him can be a great way to help him stay motivated and focused on his goals.

You might also consider having a conversation with him about his goals and aspirations in data science and programming. What specific areas is he interested in? Are there any particular industries or companies he's interested in working for? Encourage him to explore different resources, including online communities, blogs, and professional networks, to help him stay up-to-date with the latest developments in the field.

Remember to celebrate his achievement and graduation, and let him know how proud you are of him!
